FERMENTABLE.NAME: Bohemian Pilsner Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Used in pilsners lagers and ales at a rate of up to 100% of the grist. Made from the finest Bohemian quality brewing barley (barley varieties Bojos and Malz), this Pilsner malt is characterized by the typical sententious core notes of the original barley varieties. Slight nutty malt aroma.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Eraclea Pilsner Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Made from the finest two-row Italian Adriatic Coastal barley, cultivated in the region around the city of Eraclea, close to Venice. This aromatic malt provides the perfect base for crisp, aromatic and Mediterranean beers. The malt is characterized by good processability, good yield as well as excellent foam values.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Golden Promise
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Golden Promise is a heritage barley variety that dates back to the 1960s, with that barley then malted to become Golden Promise malt. Golden Promise gives beautiful mouthfeel to bring balance to beers with even the gutsiest hops and, when you drop the gravity for a session beer, you won't lose out on body.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Maris Otter
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Maris Otter's superior Brewhouse Performance is fantastic. The 'Rolls-Royce' of malts for the traditional brewer, this legendary heritage barley variety is the base malt for traditional English Bitter beers. Maris Otter has a low nitrogen content and high extract, producing a rich malty, slight nutty flavour with exceptional Brewhouse Performance and beer clarity.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Munich Malt I
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: The rich malt aroma and color of the malt are perfect for malt-forward and deeper color beer styles. Pronounced malt aroma with notes of caramel, honey and bread.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Munich Malt II
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: The rich malt aroma and color of the malt are perfect for malt-forward and deeper color beer styles. Pronounced malt aroma with notes of caramel, honey and bread.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pale Ale Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Produces excellent lighter ales or top-fermented beers. This malt is particularly suitable for an isothermal mashing process. Fine notes of bread, with hints of dried fruits and honey.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pilsner Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Made from the finest German quality brewing barley, it provides the perfect base for all beer styles, especially for bottom-fermented beers. Malty-sweet with light honey notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Premium Pilsner Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: By selecting suitable raw materials and special malting technologies, particularly light wort and boiling colors are being achieved. Malty-sweet with light honey notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Vienna Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Ideal for brewing gold-colored beers and promoting a full-body in the beer. Malty-sweet, light honey and nutty notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Barke Pilsner Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: The long-loved characteristic malt aroma of Barke is the perfect base for intensly flavourful bright lager beers. This results in an excellent body and a pronounced full-bodiedness. Pronounced malt aromas with underlying toffee notes: pleasant, soft mouthfeel.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Barke Munich Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: The long-loved characteristic malt aroma of Barke is the perfect base for intensly flavourful lager and ales. Suitable for aromatic dark beers of all styles, this malt helps to underline typical beer characteristics by amplifying the aroma. Pronounced malt aroma with notes of honey and pastries.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Barke Vienna Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: The long-loved characteristic malt aroma of Barke is the perfect base for intensly flavourful bright lager beers. This malt brings gold-colored hues to the beer and promotes full-bodiedness. Intense malt-sweet, light toffee, honey and nut notes: amused, soft mouthfeel.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Floor-Malted Tennen Pilsner Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Made from the finest Bohemian quality brewing barley (barley varieties Bojos and Malz), this malt has been produced in Bohemia, according to the traditional floor malting process. This artisanal process gives the malt a special character and an extraordinary flavor intensity. Intense malt aroma with honey and biscuit notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Floor-Malted Tennen Dark Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Made from the finest Bohemian quality brewing barley (barley varieties Bojos and Malz), this malt has been produced in Bohemia, according to the traditional floor malting process. The artisanal process gives the malt a special character and an extraordinary flavor intensity. Intense malt aroma with toffee and dark caramel notes: full body, pronounced malt sweetness.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Floor-Malted Tennen Wheat Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Made from the finest Bohemian quality brewing wheat, this malt has been produced in Bohemia, according to the traditional floor malting process. This traditional and artisanal process gives the malt a special character and an extraordinary flavor intensity. Intense wheat malt aroma and intense wheat malt taste, mild malt sweetness, velvety-creamy mouthfeel.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Biscuit Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: It gives the beer an intense sweet malt aroma reminiscent of freshly baked bread and cookies. It combines light roasted aromas with a light color. This golden glow goes perfectly with a variety of beers and gives them that special touch.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: CaraHell
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Our special manufacturing process achieves almost complete caramelization of the grain. It helps to improve foam and its stability, and helps improve the mouthfeel of any beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: CaraAmber
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: It improves the stability and refines the taste in the beer. It intensifies the beer color and lends the beer a dark red shine. Toffee, caramel and bread notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: CaraAroma
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This malt has an unique and distinct aroma. It is characterized by the greatest possible aroma complexity and serves to intensify and to stabilize beer flavor and taste. The beer color is well rounded and receives a reddish shine. First nuances of roasted aromas, notes of roasted nuts, dark caramel and dried fruit.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: CaraBelge
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This golden-brown malt gives the beer a deeper color and rounds off the aroma harmoniously. Notes of caramel, dried fruits and nuts (almonds)

FERMENTABLE.NAME: CaraBohemian
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: By intensifying the caramelization process, an increase in the malt color and the dark caramel notes is achieved in this malt. Bread, caramel and toffee notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: CaraMunich I
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This malt is perfect for amber to dark copper colored beers and intensifies the malt body. Pronounced caramel aroma with fine pastries.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: CaraMunich II
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This malt is perfect for amber to dark copper colored beers and intensifies the malt body. Pronounced caramel aroma with fine pastries.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: CaraMunich III
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This malt is perfect for amber to dark copper colored beers and intensifies the malt body. Pronounced caramel aroma with clear pastry notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: CaraPils
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This malt is characterized by a high proportion of dextrins and high molecular weight proteins. This makes it ideal for improving foam and its stability as well as adding body to any beer. Due to the light malt color, it can be used universally from the brightest to the darkest beer styles.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: CaraRed
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This malt develops its typical aroma which serves to intensify and stabilize the taste profile in various beers. The beer color is intensified and can develop into an orange-red shine. For a deep red beer, we recommend a combination of CaraRed with Melanoidin malt. Malty-sweet with notes of caramel, honey and pastry.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Crystal Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Our Crystal brings mild caramel and toffee flavours to beers, whilst contributing a beautiful golden hue. Its clean, mild sweetness brings depth of flavour where extra body is required, without adding overtly toasted or roasted characters.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Abbey Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: The special manufacturing process creates an extra crunchy malt with a complex aroma profile, which is used to intensify and stabilize the taste in beer. The beer color is enhanced and the malt adds copper-golden shine. Complex malt aroma with intense notes of biscuit and honey, nuts and chocolate.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Beech Smoked Barley Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: The strong beech wood smoke gives this malt its unmistakable flavor, hence being the ideal ingredient to perfect any aroma-intensive beer style. Pronounced smoke aroma, malty-sweet, with vanilla and honey notes

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Oak Smoked Wheat Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: The oak smoke gives this malt its unique elegant aroma. Finest cigars smoke aroma, light toffee-and biscuit notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Peated Malt Light
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Ingredient for providing the essential peat flavour in whisky production. 5 ppm Phenols.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Peated Malt Heavy
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Ingredient for providing the essential peat flavour in whisky production. 50 ppm Phenols.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Acidulated Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Contains natural lactic acid derived from un-hopped beer wort. Important ingredient to adjust the mash- and thus wort pH. Contributes to the optimization of the mash conversion. Fruity-acidic, universally applicable. Recommended addition: 1% sour malt addition reduces the mash pH by approx. 0.1.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Melanoidin Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Melanoidin malt can be used to intensify and stabilize the tasting profile and flavor in beer. The beer color is intensified and receives a dark red shine. Pronounced honey and biscuit notes

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Special W
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This dark brown malt offers the most complex aroma spectrum of all Weyermann caramel malts. Notes of raisins, dark caramel, pronounced aromas of nuts, pastries and bread.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Red X
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Red X has become synonymous with beers with a reddish color. It can be used 100% of the grain bill and is thus ready for use without the addition of further malts. It ensures, with the highest possible process reliability and optimum processability, that reproducibly bright beers with intense red colors can be brewed. The malt was designed for a beer with 12° Plato. For stronger beers, due to the higher original wort content, some Pilsner malt should be added proportionally to the bulk to get back into the red range.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Spelt Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Typical malty-sweet with light nut notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Rye Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Typical rye aroma, malty-sweet with notes of bread and honey. Rye malt also creates a velvety-soft mouthfeel.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Rye Caramel Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Intense aroma of bread, coffee, dark chocolate and dried fruit. Creates a velvety-soft mouthfeel.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Rye Chocolate Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Our gentle roasting process gives this dark brown malt a fine yet pronounced roasted aroma. Mild coffee, chocolate, nut, nougat and bread notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Oat Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Once you crack it open, the creaminess of the oats releases a silky smoothness which imparts a sumptuous velvety texture to your beer. This fullness allows it to take as many hops as you can throw at it for a juice bomb, providing balance. In more traditional usage, Malted Oats provide the back bone of creaminess in Oatmeal Stouts and Porters, smoothing the astringency that may result from the heavy use of roasted grains and adding a complexity of flavour. Malted Oats is a hugely versatile product that can be added to any beer style to impart a creamy, velvety smooth mouthfeel.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Golden Naked Oats
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This huskless oat crystal malt is quite simply delicious. An exotic ingredient for the adventurous brewer, it brings a subtle nutty flavour. Its creaminess brings mouthfeel and balance to strong, hop forward beers. One taste and we're sure you'll be inspired to start creating a new recipe.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Buckwheat Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Château Buckwheat malt is used in the production of gluten-free beer. Adds a particular nutty and malty flavor to your beer. It also can be used in specialty beers to render a rich and deep tone.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt, Pale
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This malt provides the perfect base for light wheat beers and other top-fermented beer specialties. Bread, nut, biscuit, toffee and light caramel notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt, CaraWheat
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This malt encompasses golden brown and intensely aromatic grains. Light notes of caramel, almond, bread and pastry

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Chocolate Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Gently roasted this malt has a high color intensity and aroma. Intensive dark chocolate notes, mild-roasted aromatic, coffee and bread notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Brown Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Our Brown Malt imparts a rich coffee aroma ideal for Stouts and Porters. It delivers a smooth mouthfeel as well as increasing foam stability. The hue is a deep mahogany that brings warmth and depth to dark beers. Often a forgotten malt.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa I
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Gently roasted, this series of malts is characterized by its high color intensity and unique roasting aromas. Finely roasted aromatic, coffee, cocoa and dark chocolate notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa II
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Gently roasted, this series of malts is characterized by its high color intensity and unique roasting aromas. Finely roasted aromatic, coffee, cocoa and dark chocolate notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa III
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Gently roasted, this series of malts is characterized by its high color intensity and unique roasting aromas. Finely roasted aromatic, coffee, cocoa and dark chocolate notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa Special I
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: With our unique manufacturing process for our Special series, a large portion of the husk of the grain is removed. Together with an adapted roasting program, this results in the finest roasting aroma while minimizing the roasted bitterness. Finely roasted aromatic; Coffee, cocoa and dark chocolate notes

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa Special II
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: With our unique manufacturing process for our Special series, a large portion of the husk of the grain is removed. Together with an adapted roasting program, this results in the finest roasting aroma while minimizing the roasted bitterness. Finely roasted aromatic; Coffee, cocoa and dark chocolate notes

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa Special II
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: With our unique manufacturing process for our Special series, a large portion of the husk of the grain is removed. Together with an adapted roasting program, this results in the finest roasting aroma while minimizing the roasted bitterness. Finely roasted aromatic; Coffee, cocoa and dark chocolate notes

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Roasted Barley
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: The roasted barley is characterized by intense coloring power and the most intense roasting aroma. Typical, intense roasting with coffee notes

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pilsner Malt (CH)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: It provides the perfect base for all beer styles, especially for bottom-fermented beers. Malty-sweet with light honey notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Vienna Malt (CH)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Ideal for brewing gold-colored beers and promoting a full-body in the beer. Malty-sweet, light honey and nutty notes.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pale Ale Malt (CH)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Produces excellent lighter ales or top-fermented beers. This malt is particularly suitable for an isothermal mashing process. Fine notes of bread, with hints of dried fruits and honey.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramel Malt (CH)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: The rich malt aroma and color of the malt are perfect for malt-forward and deeper color beer styles. Pronounced malt aroma with notes of caramel, honey, bread and a slight hint of coffee.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Munich Malt (CH)
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: The rich malt aroma and color of the malt are perfect for malt-forward and deeper color beer styles. Pronounced malt aroma with notes of caramel, honey and bread.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Flaked Barley
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use as an adjunct in all-grain brews to produce a lighter colored finished beer without lowering the original gravity. The flakes can be incorporated directly into your mash with other grains because they have a large surface area and are pre-cooked so they hydrate and disintegrate quickly.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Flaked Oat
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: These oat flakes add a smooth, rich enjoyable texture to stouts and have a very distinctive ?sticky? mouthfeel which is noticeable even when used in small amounts. They have a large surface area and are pre-cooked, so they hydrate and disintegrate quickly.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Flaked Corn
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Use to produce a beer with mild, less malty flavor and a drier, more crisp beer. These can be used as a cereal adjunct and can be added to the mash without first using a cereal cooker. The pregelatinized flakes will give a higher yield and a more trouble-free brew than conventional flaked corn. You can add them directly to the mash with the malt without having to mill.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Flaked Wheat
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: These wheat flakes are great in the production of Belgian Wit beers and increase foam stability. They have a large surface area and are pre-cooked, so they hydrate and disintegrate quickly.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Flaked Rice
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: These rice flakes are made specifically for brewing, developing characteristics necessary for easy and efficient use in a brewhouse. They have a large surface area and are pre-cooked, so they hydrate and disintegrate quickly and offer a light, clean, and crisp character to the finished beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Brown Sugar
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Rich, sweet flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Sugar, Table
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dries out beer. Too much adds a cidery flavour.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Honey
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dries out beer. Can add some flowery flavours.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Lactose
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Lactose is not fermentable, so adds a sweetness to the finished beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Candi Sugar, White
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This white Belgian Candi Sugar is a refined form of beet sugar and is completely fermentable. Candi sugar helps maintain the high alcohol content of certain Belgian ales while keeping them dry and crisp, avoiding an overly malty or sweet beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Candi Sugar, Brown
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: This dark Belgian Candi Sugar is a refined form of beet sugar and is completely fermentable. Candi sugar helps maintain the high alcohol content of certain Belgian ales while keeping them dry and crisp, avoiding an overly malty or sweet beer.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Candi Syrup
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Unmistakable flavours of fresh ground coffee, dark stone fruits and toasted bread. The basis for cloning renowned Belgian Strong Dark Ales like Westvleteren 12 and Rochefort 10, as well as many others. Gives exceptional results when the goal is authentic Belgian Dark Ales. Dark colours and superior flavour.
